ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Unilateral Amputation Below or Above Knee, Unspecified Laterality

ns0:Concept.displayName: Unilateral traumatic amputation of leg at OR above knee with complication (situation)
Unilateral traumatic amputation of leg below knee with complication (situation)
Unilateral traumatic amputation of leg at OR above knee without complication (situation)
Traumatic amputation of leg(s) (complete) (partial), unilateral, below knee, without mention of complication
Traumatic amputation of leg(s) (complete) (partial), unilateral, below knee, complicated
Traumatic amputation of leg(s) (complete) (partial), unilateral, at or above knee, without mention of complication
Traumatic amputation of leg(s) (complete) (partial), unilateral, at or above knee, complicated
Unilateral traumatic amputation of leg below knee without complication (situation)
Congenital absence of both lower leg and foot, unspecified lower limb

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a unilateral amputation procedure, above or below the knee, without a specified laterality.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying unilateral amputation above or below the knee without a specified laterality.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.113.11.1218:Unilateral Amputation Below or Above Knee, Unspecified Laterality),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.113.11.1219:Unilateral Amputation Below or Above Knee, Unspecified Laterality),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.464.1003.113.11.1307:Unilateral Amputation Below or Above Knee, Unspecified Laterality)
